title: SCP-6121 Offset 1
content:
[[module CSS]]
.wiki-content-table tbody tr th {
    color: #ffffff;
    background-color: #8B5E8C;
    border: 1px solid #000000;
}
table.wiki-content-table td {
    background-color: #FFFFFF;
    color: #000000;
}
@import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=PT+Serif&display=swap");@import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=IBM+Plex+Mono&display=swap");div.irc-log{margin:10px;margin-top:20px;padding:10px;border:3px solid #000000;background-color:#333333;border-radius:15px;font-family:"IBM Plex Mono",monospace;color:#FFFFFF;font-size: 125%;}div.irc-log td{border:1px solid #000000;font-weight:bold}div.irc-log p{line-height:200%}div.irc-log span.userred{font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:1px;background-color:#ffabab;color:#050505;padding-left:2px;border:1px solid #ffabab;margin-right:.25em}div.irc-log span.userwhite{font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:1px;background-color:#ffffff;color:#050505;padding-left:2px;border:0px solid #ffabab;margin-right:.25em}div.irc-log span.userplague{font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:1px;background-color:#9FB6F4;color:#050505;padding-left:2px;border:1px solid #9FB6F4;margin-right:.25em}div.irc-log span.userdune{font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:1px;background-color:#1CAFEC;color:#050505;padding-left:2px;border:1px solid #1CAFEC;margin-right:.25em}div.irc-log span.usergreen{font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:1px;background-color:#afffb1;color:#050505;padding-left:2px;border:1px solid #afffb1;margin-right:.25em}div.irc-log::before{content:"SCiPNET Messaging System";position:relative;top:-1.5em;left:-1.5em;border:2px solid #050505;color:#050505;background-color:#5effa6;font-family:"PT Serif",serif;padding:1px 3px;border-radius:3px;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:2px}div.inventory-report{margin:10px;margin-top:20px;padding:10px;border:2px solid #050505;background-color:#eee;border-radius:3px}
[[/module]]

[[module CSS]]
:root {
    --timeDelay: 0.5s;
[[/module]]

[[module css]]
:root {
--thaumiel: 0, 135, 189
}
[[/module]]

[[div]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
[[=]]
**SCP-6121: "the capslock crew"**
Cruise control for 'cineration.

[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/this-page-intentionally-left-blank/Caps.png]]

**[[[http://www.scp-wiki.net/this-page-intentionally-left-blank|More by this author!]]]**
[[/=]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]
[[/div]]

[[div]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:customizable-acs
|containment-class= Decommissioned
|containment-image= http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/calibri-s-mega-cool-art-page-it-s-mostly-just-icons-but-what/Decommissioned.svg
|containment-color= 66, 66, 72
|inc-neutralized-layout = --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:customizable-acs
|clearance-four= 0, 0, 0
|inc-clearance= --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:anomaly-class-bar-source
|item-number= SCP-6121-D
|clearance= 2
|container-class= Decommissioned
|secondary-class= none
|disruption-class= none
|risk-class= none
]]
[[/div]]

----

[[include component:image-block
    name=http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/harry-blank-7/Instances.jpg|
    caption=SCP-6121 instances in transit to Site-19. |
    width=700px |
    align=center |
]]

**Archived Containment Procedures:** See [/scp-6121/offset/0 previous iteration].

----

**Description:** SCP-6121 was a blanket designation for a series of humanoid anomalies resembling human beings wearing mascot character costumes. SCP-6121 instances manifested through unknown means at large scale public events held primarily within the nation of Canada, resembling said events' official mascots (though always deviating from the approved designs in one or several respects).

----

**Addendum 6121-1, Disposal:** On 10/24/2008, all instances of SCP-6121 were transferred to Site-19 under the direct purview of Dr. A. Clef. One week after their arrival, Dr. Clef submitted decommissioning documents to the O5 Council, citing:

* the expense of maintaining separate containment chambers for so many subjects;
* the danger inherent in housing so many unpredictable subjects in the same containment chamber;
* the unchecked and unsustainable rate of new subject production;
* the productivity loss inherent in interviewing and managing each new subject;
* the complete lack of useful research conducted on said subjects since 1963;
* the inability of research personnel to prove that said subjects possessed sapience, due to their simple rote behaviour and nonsensical utterances;
* the incongruence of said subjects with all other known anomalous phenomena, each instance appearing to represent a form of "humour" thus far unattested in the SCP database;
* the possibility that said subjects represented an infiltration of Foundation containment facilities by a hostile Group of Interest.

Dr. Clef's request was accepted, and on 11/17/2008 he decommissioned each instance individually with a hand-held flame delivery device.

Subsequent to this act, no further SCP-6121 instances have appeared. This file is considered inactive.

The source of the manifestations remains unknown.

----

[[div style="border:solid 1px #999999; background:#F2E0C2; padding-left:12px; padding-right:12px; padding-top:6px; padding-bottom:12px; margin-bottom: 10px;"]]
[[=]]
++++ NOTICE!
A Security Clearance Level 3+ discussion has been initiated regarding this file!

[[collapsible show="ACTIVATE ALL-SITES INTERLINK" hide="ALL-SITES INTERLINK ACTIVATED"]]
[[/=]]
@@ @@
[[div class="irc-log"]]
|| **{{All-Sites Interlink}}**||
[[<]]
* J_Dune_179 (Dr. Jay Dune) has initiated discussion.
* P_Lague_322 (Director Paul Lague) has joined the discussion.
* H_Blank_43 (Dr. Harold R. Blank) has joined the discussion.

[[span class="userdune"]]**J_Dune_179:**[[/span]] he did WHAT

[[span class="userplague"]]**P_Lague_322:**[[/span]] what the FUCK

[[span class="userdune"]]**J_Dune_179:**[[/span]] even owl guy?

[[span class="userplague"]]**P_Lague_322:**[[/span]] I loved owl guy!

[[span class="userdune"]]**J_Dune_179:**[[/span]] hoot hoot

[[span class="userdune"]]**J_Dune_179:**[[/span]] mother fucker

* C_Bold_DeD (Director Calvin Bold) has joined the discussion.

[[span class="userred"]]**C_Bold_DeD:**[[/span]] WHY

[[span class="userred"]]**C_Bold_DeD:**[[/span]] I LOVED THEM

[[span class="userred"]]**C_Bold_DeD:**[[/span]] I'M SAD NOW

[[span class="userplague"]]**P_Lague_322:**[[/span]] [[span class="userwhite"]]"[/scp-5595 UNATTESTED] [/scp-5648 IN] [/scp-6345 THE] [/scp-6597 SCP] [/scp-6599 DATABASE]"[[/span]]?!

[[span class="usergreen"]]**H_Blank_43:**[[/span]] WE DIDN'T KNOW, OKAY
[[/<]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/collapsible]]
